h3_title: Chen Loong Boss Fight and Guide
content: Other times, he may only summon one smaller tail, but this one can expel its electrical energy in a projectile blast when the tail swings.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chen_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Chen Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Chen Loong' and the sub-subsection 'Chen Loong Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Other times, he may only summon one smaller tail, but this one can expel its electrical energy in a projectile blast when the tail swings.
